title: Himi 16
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Ha’u ‘akimoutolu
Kuo mou lava’i
‘O ‘ofa ki he ‘Otua
Ki he fakataha.
2.
Pea ke tau hiva
‘I he loto lelei,
‘A e hiva fiefia
Ki hotau ‘Otua.
3.
Ko e ta’e ‘ilo
‘A hotau ‘Otua
Tuku ke nau ta’e hiva
Ka ko kitautolu.
4.
Kuo tau ongo’i
‘Ene ngāue lelei,
Ke tau fakaongo atu
‘A e fiefia.
5.
He ko e ‘Otua
‘Oku ‘i ‘olunga,
Pea ‘oku pule ia
Pea ta’engata.
6.
‘Oku heka ia
‘I he langi afā
Pea ta’ofi ‘e ia
‘A e tahi kovi.
7.
Ko e ‘Otua ni
Fakamanavahē
Ko ‘etau Tamai ia
Pea mo e ‘ofa. *
